name: DRONEKILLER
description:
The evil corporation C-CORP just released its swarm of drones, and is holding the city hostage. The only hope is The Hero, a vigilante with a high-tech Explosion Sword. His "mission control" guy, Transmute, has a plan to stop the drones, but C-CORP's CEO will stop at nothing to prevent it.

Made in 9 days for The GDB Juice Jam
